title: Ticket #4243: Support submission to CREAM via IPv6
description:
CREAM supports job submission via IPv6, but the version of the client library we're using is too old. We have some users interested in submitting to CREAM servers that are reachable only via IPv6. We can do this by updating some of our externals.

We need to make the following changes:

  • Update the version of gsoap used for CREAM and enable its IPv6 support.
  • Update the version of CREAM and some of the packages it depends on.
  • Use the gridftp client library in Globus 5.2.5 instead of a modified copy from an older Globus version.
